description.plain: As stated by Pigeons & Planes – “Lava La Rue is a 20-year-old Londoner who does it all. She founded underground DIY arts collective NiNE8 when she was a teenager with some of her friends, and they have built a creative community that encompasses clothing, visual art, and music. "It’s all about being positive and supporting each other, being inclusive and experimental,” she tells us."
